description: Looking for an easy chicken recipe? With just four steps and five ingredients, you'll be enjoying this garlicky chicken with mash in just 20 minutes.
keywords: Roast chicken,High protein,Winter,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken,Sesame free
name: Speedy Chilli, Garlic & Rosemary Chicken with Mash & Beans Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths COOK chilli, garlic & rosemary chicken breast steaks

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large nonstick frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 4 minutes each side or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate, loosely cover with foil and rest for 2 minutes. Slice chicken thickly.
Meanwhile, heat mash according to packet instructions.
Place gravy, 1/4 cup water and any resting juices from chicken in same frying pan and bring to the boil, stirring over medium heat. Add beans and cook for 2 minutes or until beans are tender.
Divide mash, chicken and beans among plates. Spoon gravy over chicken and serve.
